programmes.show_description: Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.
Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.
20/20. Tha Muireall 'g iarraidh a dhol suas ann am bailiùn airson cuairt-adhair. Muireall wants to go in a balloon for a trip up in the sky.
11/15. Eilidh Cormack meets Callum and his pet dogs Penny and Poppy.
13/21. At a Bat Cave sleepover, the friends can't keep quiet. Aig pàrtaidh-oidhch' Uamh nan Ialtag, tha e doirbh do gach caraid fuireach sàmhach - tha na h-ialtagan ri cadal-geamhraidh.
14/21. Baba and Lala have found something very exciting. Tha Baba is Lala air rudeigin air leth sònraicht' a lorg.
3/26. Petit has a loose tooth and is not willing to hand it to the tooth mouse at any cost!
6/26. Fox wants to give Hare the best birthday ever. Owl and Tusk are invited, but only if they bring a nice present.
20/80. Niall Iain Dòmhnallach a' leughadh Norton agus Alpha. Niall Iain Macdonald reads Norton agus Alpha.
...Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door. 36/52. Chan eil Stella idir measail air actadh. Stella isn't at all keen on acting.
...Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door. 37/52. Tha Stella ri strì 'son faighinn a-mach a bheil bràmair aig Mgr Bruno. Stella is determined to find out if Mr Bruno has a girlfriend.
11/12. Tha Mia airson Jimmy an t-asal a mharcachd air an tràigh. Mia aims to ride Jimmy the donkey on the beach.
7/13. Tha Flix 'son film fhaicinn ach, gu mì-fhortanach, the e ro òg 'son fhaicinn. Flix would like to see a film, but unfortunately he's too young to get in.
7/20. When one of the pigs attempts to make friends with Timmy, his cohorts evict him as punishment for un-pig-like behaviour.
Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.
13/13. Drama Gàidhlig stèidhichte ann an Leòdhas. Gaelic soap based on the Isle of Lewis.
7/12. Tha Abigail ag ullachadh Bircher Muesli, bracaist làn spionnaidh. Abigail prepares a Bircher muesli, perfect for a hearty breakfast.
1/8. Ramsay escapes Glasgow for a weekend on the iconic hills and white beaches of Assynt. Ramsay a'teiche a Glaschu airson dà dheagh latha air beanntan is tràighean geala Asainnte.
3/5. Mairi's busy getting plants in the ground. She learns about natural dyeing and flower growing as a business.
When Scotland's hockey team was invited to play against West Germany in Berlin in September 1961, it was just weeks after the Berlin Wall had been constructed.
28/33. The Hoosiers rock the Garden Stage on the final night of Belladrum. Contains scenes of flashing images.
1/6. Coinneach MacFhraing makes the journey over to the remote island of Mingulay, home to some of the most spectacular sea cliffs in Europe.
1/2. Cuirm Òran Ùr aig Celtic Connections a' comharrachadh òrain ùra Gàidhlig. Òran Ùr concert at Celtic Connections celebrating new Gaelic songs.
Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.
Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.
11/26. Tha sinn a' dèanamh danns' le seanganan an-diugh. We are dancing with ants today.
20/20. Tha Muireall 'g iarraidh a dhol suas ann am bailiùn airson cuairt-adhair. Muireall wants to go in a balloon for a trip up in the sky.
6/8. Celestine tells Mrs Tulip's nephews about the Green Mouse's existence, revealing no bear has ever seen it.
...Adventures of Abney & Teal. 26/52. Abney's front door is blocked by a huge leaf pile, which Teal has great fun jumping in.
6/26. Fox wants to give Hare the best birthday ever. Owl and Tusk are invited, but only if they bring a nice present.
...Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door. 37/52. Tha Stella ri strì 'son faighinn a-mach a bheil bràmair aig Mgr Bruno. Stella is determined to find out if Mr Bruno has a girlfriend.
...Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door. 38/52. Tha Stella sìceach an-diugh. Stella is psychic today.
2/3. Hannah a' toirt sùil air ais air cuid de na caractaran iongantach a thadhail air CBBC ALBA. Hannah introduces some of the surprising characters who have visited the CBBC Alba studio.
12/12. Tha Calum a' strì airson soirbheachais aig Cogadh nan Còmhlan. Calum wants to take his band to victory in Oban at the Battle of the Bands.
Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.
7/8. Mairi Rodgers explores Falkland Palace Garden in Fife. Tha Màiri Rodgers a' gabhail cuairt tro Ghàrradh Lùchairt Falkland.
3/12. Stories include disquiet about explosive materials being carried on Cal Mac ferries, and a German ban on Scottish venison as a result of the Chernobyl disaster.
2/8. Sgrìob tro cuairt-beatha nam ban le tro cheòl is òrain. 'Sann air àm breith agus àm baistidh a tha sinn a cuir ar h-aghaidh an t-seachdain seo. The focus is on birth and baptism.
1/8. Ramsay escapes Glasgow for a weekend on the iconic hills and white beaches of Assynt. Ramsay a'teiche a Glaschu airson dà dheagh latha air beanntan is tràighean geala Asainnte.
1/12. Niall Iain Macdonald hosts a new quiz show where two teams battle to win a cash prize. Niall Iain Dòmhnallach le farpais cheist ùr is dà sgioba a' strì airson duais airgid.
7/8. Heather Dewar meets Ryan Dziadowiec and draws his colour portrait. Fraoch Nic an Deòir cuide ri Ryan Dziadowiec agus i ga dhealbhadh ann an dath.
1/2. Singer Ruairidh Gray visits the Grand Ole Opry and brings us musical highlights from the legendary music series.
...Cogaidh/Female Spies of WWII. 6/6. The stories of some of the brave women who put their lives on the line during WWII. Contains some scenes which some viewers may find upsetting.
7/33. Ceòl trad beothail bho Falasgair air Àrd-Ùrlar Hot House aig Belladrum 2025. Falasgair bring high-energy trad music to the Hot House Stage at Belladrum 2025. Contains strong language.
2/2. Carrie MacNeil presents Grade 1 performances from the World Pipe Band Championships 2022.
